daily_take.headline: Iran Strike Odds Crater as Markets Price In Diplomatic Reality
daily_take.deck: Traders dumped Iran strike bets overnight, slashing odds from 22.5% to 12.5% in a single day. The shift suggests growing conviction that escalation rhetoric won't translate to US military action before March. The $1.4M volume shows this isn't fringe speculation, it's where serious money sees the real probability.
